metadata.title: Wednesday, 22nd March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade Chanida Border Post in Katete District to a one stop border post; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) when the Government will electrify the Kabinga Chiefdom in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
